txt.en: 'The venom subsides and your vision returns, but Pughlak has regained its strength!'
'Pughlak's venom alters your vision, putting you in a dream-like trance!'
You must have completed 'Discovery: Den of Pughlak' to play this instance.
'Where is my knife?! I dropped it right here!'
'The only way further into the cavern is down.'
'Was Pughlak's den once a shrine of the Nameless?'
